txt.en:
'Hail, [placeholder]. You have truly shown your worth as a master of rune-craft, and I can no longer match your prowess. No more can I teach you about the mysteries of the Angerthas and Tengwar.

'Few are the rune-keepers who can claim such wisdom, but Dardúr knows many secrets. If you seek the great secrets of our calling, he is the one you must find.

'Long and far does Dardúr wander, but in these dark times he will surely dwell in Gondamon in Ered Luin.'

'Long and far does Dardúr wander, but in these dark times he will surely dwell in Gondamon in Ered Luin.'
Rune-keeper: Meaning upon Meaning

'Dardúr, a wise rune-keeper, dwells in Gondamon in Ered Luin. Travel to him and see what he might be able to teach you.'
As a Rune-keeper, you have achieved such renown as to receive a summons from Dardúr of Gondamon.\n\nYou should seek Dardúr to receive further training in your class.

Talk to Dardúr at Gondamon
'Dardúr, a wise rune-keeper, dwells in Gondamon in Ered Luin. Travel to him and see what he might be able to teach you.'

'Hail, [placeholder]. You have truly shown your worth as a master of rune-craft, and I can no longer match your prowess. No more can I teach you about the mysteries of the Angerthas and Tengwar.

'Few are the rune-keepers who can claim such wisdom, but Dardúr knows many secrets. If you seek the great secrets of our calling, he is the one you must find.

'Welcome and well met, [placeholder]. I have heard of your cunning in the ways of the graven rune. Our sort are rare in Middle-earth, and I fear that soon we will pass away.'

'Welcome and well met, [placeholder]. I have heard of your cunning in the ways of the graven rune. Our sort are rare in Middle-earth, and I fear that soon we will pass away.

'The secrets of our trade hark back to Daeron and Fëanor themselves, but both Elves and dwarves have added much to the depth of our craft. Many ancient secrets of the written word lie hidden in the forgotten places of Middle-earth.

'The road ahead is hard, but what thing that is worth doing is not? The gaining of wisdom is ever a struggle, but it is a fulfilling one. If you believe you are ready, then say on, and I will set your feet upon the path to greater knowledge.'
Meet Dardúr for further Rune-keeper training
The secrets of rune-lore lie open to you. Meaning upon meaning lies within them, and their power sings in your blood.

'Hail, [placeholder]. You have truly shown your worth as a master of rune-craft, and I can no longer match your prowess. No more can I teach you about the mysteries of the Angerthas and Tengwar.

'Few are the rune-keepers who can claim such wisdom, but Dardúr knows many secrets. If you seek the great secrets of our calling, he is the one you must find.

'Long and far does Dardúr wander, but in these dark times he will surely dwell in Gondamon in Ered Luin.'
